EmailTemplate.name: Physician Summary notification email
EmailTemplate.subject: Please share public Calender name
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Physician__c.Name},
Congratulations, you have been successfully registered and added as a Physician in our Medical centre system, please follow below instructions to share one of your Google calender details with us so that we can start making appointments for you :
1. Please navigate to your Google calender and add a new calender. 2. Share your calender with {!User.Name} or {!User.Email}
Please do get in touch with us in case of any issues.
Thank you, MEDICAL CENTRE
